message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you take 10.  We can negotiate later if you want.
That's a pretty imbalanced starting point, Alice. How about I take a larger share this time - it's only fair considering the inflation we're dealing with.
Let's try a 50/50 split this time.  We both lose money if we keep going back and forth.  We can make more if we agree now.
